channel.title: Confused about items
channel.description:
Ok im used to all-star source and i changed to dragon-history source. THe item.cfg is alot different and im confused. I'm trying to change my perfect ring stats to wear i can 1-hit any monster.
Also if anyone knows how to make it to were you dont have to kill jad to wear a fc.

item.title: Confused about items
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

go into item.cfg, open using notepad, find item id 773 and input this code.

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.	1469.99280576915	1469.99280576915	1760.58823743125	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000	10000

Read full topic
